title: Lakshmi Devi Kasu Mala - Divine Grace Necklace
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features emeralds
and brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Meticulously crafted with high-quality materials.
features: Classic temple jewelry design featuring intricately crafted Lakshmi Devi motifs. The main pendant showcasing Lakshmi is flanked by peacock designs set with emeralds. The necklace is embellished with CZ stones set in a pave setting. The gold is finished with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine. Traditional design with modern finesse.
colors: Primarily gold with accents of emerald green and the brilliant sparkle of white CZ stones. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich
occasions: traditional Telugu functions like Seemantham (baby shower)
and other auspicious occasions. Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: This Kasu Mala represents divine blessings and prosperity. The combination of Lakshmi Devi, emeralds, and the intricate design embodies the rich heritage of South Indian temple jewelry. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. A timeless piece that can be passed down through generations.
